title: Disintegrate
content:
Disintegrate Level 6 Transmutation Spell 50~100 Damage 10d6 + 40Force Shoot a thin green ray from your finger. If the 50∼100 Force damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash. 9mDEX Save Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Level 6 Transmutation Spell

Shoot a thin green ray from your finger. If the 50∼100 Force damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash.
